tool_description: An API Showing the Latest Sports News around the world
name: World Sport Live
title: World Sport Live

api_list.name: Get Individual  Sports Source News
api_list.description: Get World Sport News from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-sport-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-sport-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-sport-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-sport-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All World Sport News
api_list.description: This End Point will return the Latest  Sports News from all over the world
